description: This file defines a data transfer object (DTO) class 'ReadyRequest' used to represent requests to toggle readiness status in the backend of a game application. It contains a color identifier and a boolean indicating readiness.

classes.name: ReadyRequest
classes.description: A DTO used for signaling a player's readiness state and associated color in the game.

methods.name: getColor
methods.description: Returns the color associated with the readiness request.

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Sets the color associated with the readiness request.

methods.name: isReady
methods.description: Returns whether the player is marked as ready.

methods.name: setReady
methods.description: Sets the readiness status of the player.
